Blue Ocean is proud to launch another cutting-edge condominium at No. 31, De Alwis Place, Dehiwala. The new project will cater uniquely designed modern architecture apartments which are fully luxury with sophistication and elegance blend in tranquility at an elite residential neighborhood in the heart of Dehiwala.

Blue Ocean at De Alwis Place, Dehiwala is comprised into an 8-storey, 25-unit condominium with a unique appearance. The completion of this project will be on time and ready for occupancy as per the schedule. Each apartment comprises two and three bedroom units including a spacious living room, pantry and dining room that guarantee a comfortable living for its occupants.

The apartments are designed with modern architecture and interior amenities to suit the latest styles for a luxury living in a cosmopolitan setting. The rooms are designed to deliver sophistication and elegance. The atmosphere of tranquility and relaxation is enhanced by the pastel tiled floors. The serenity of the private balcony overlooking the sea and city view adds to the appeal of these rooms. Mirroring the kaleidoscope of life and nature, the fusion of sky and earth is seamlessly reflected in captivating architecture of these apartments whilst merging luxurious modern amenities and entertainment in a sophisticated cosmopolitan setting in the heart of the Colombo’s immediate suburb.
